channel.title: CVE Feed for Smart eVision Information Technology Inc. -- Smart eVision
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Smart eVision Information Technology Inc. -- Smart eVision

item.title: CVE-2022-39035|2024-09-17T01:41:03.849Z -- smart%20evision%20information%20technology%20inc. -- smart%20evision
item.description: Smart eVision has insufficient filtering for special characters in the POST Data parameter in the specific function. An unauthenticated remote attacker can inject JavaScript to perform XSS (Stored Cross-Site Scripting) attack.
